txt.en: TBD Amongst the Stones of Shulgmokh, Wood-Trolls have long ravaged those who dwell in the Floodfells.  Seek them out and put and end to these most foul creatures.

The wood-trolls dwelling at Shulgmokh possess the great strength of the natural world, but that power is sharpened by the cruelty and anger of which they have always been possessed. They must be eliminated before they turn this strength upon the folk that live in the Floodfells.

The wood-trolls dwelling at Shulgmokh possess the great strength of the natural world, but that power is sharpened by the cruelty and anger of which they have always been possessed. They must be eliminated before they turn this strength upon the folk that live in the Floodfells.

Wood-trolls dwell at Shulgmokh, wrapping their root-like tendrils around the stones and crushing them to powder with strength unseen. They pose a deadly threat to adventurers in these lands, and must be eliminated.

The wood-trolls dwelling at Shulgmokh possess the great strength of the natural world, but that power is sharpened by the cruelty and anger of which they have always been possessed. They must be eliminated before they turn this strength upon the folk that live in the Floodfells.
Shulgmokh will never be completely free of the threat posed by the wood-trolls that dwell there, but you have done much to lessen that danger for now.
